Consulta id: {{ id }}

XD
 import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { ConsultaService } from '../../../../../Services/Consultas'; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; @Component({ selector: 'app-form-consulta', templateUrl: './form-consulta.component.html', styleUrls: ['./form-consulta.component.css'] }) export class FormConsultaComponent { public show = false; id : number = 0; constructor(private http: HttpClient , private ConsultasService: ConsultaService ) { } //Metodo De inicio de tabla ngOnInit() : void { console.log(this.ConsultasService.getId()) } showModalInicial(datos: any){ this.id = datos.IdConsultas; this.show = true; } hideModal(){ this.show = false; } }
